name: Mother (itch) (Alventia)
description:
Mother is a single player, 2D narrative adventure game comprising time loops and multiple endings. As the player progresses through the game, they will slowly come to discover the truth of their identity.

Originally set in a sci-fi society, our player wakes up in a room where a mysterious voice leads them through a series of decisions that affects their experience and changes the encounters they have with characters in our world. With each loop, the scenes will begin to slowly “degrade” as the player gains more insight into what is going on. There are three main storylines total, each having their own unique ending(s) -- the Killer, the Pacifist, and the Outlier.
